name: OCP Secretary Receives Belorussian Orthodox Journalists and Media Experts at I.A.O Conference

desc.html: At the first day of the Inter-parliamentary Assembly on Orthodoxy (I.A.O.) Conference seminar on Mass Media, George Alexander Secretary and Spokesperson of Orthodoxy Cognate PAGE Society received a number of Orthodox journalist and Media experts from the Metropolis of the Belarussian Orthodox Church of the Moscow Patriarchate at the St Gregory Palamas Centre.
